content: stitched from the top down this classic knit pullover will be off the needles and in your closet in very little time featuring easy-to-work raglan shaping plus knit and simple decrease techniques the hardest part about this easy project will be deciding which indulgent shade of bernat velvet you love most it s a wonderful gift - if you can part with it materials sizes u s 8 5 mm and u s 10 6 mm circular knitting needle 24 61 cm long set of 4 sizes u s 9 5 5 mm and u s 10 6 mm double-pointed knitting needles sizes bust measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm finished bust xs/s 40 101 5 cm m 42½ 108 cm l 46½ 118 cm xl 52 132 cm 2/3xl 58½ 148 5 cm 4/5xl 66 167 5 cm
